long_description: Store your important electronic, photo or other gear in this rugged watertight container offering 108 cubic inches of storage space. Inside dimensions are 7-3/8" L x 4-7/8" W x 3" D. Neoprene O-ring seal makes this one of the toughest, airtight, watertight equipment-protector cases available-guaranteed! Hard case is constructed from a lightweight, space-age structural resin. Shock-absorbing pre-scored foam allows you to customize interior to fit your specific equipment. Atmospheric-pressure purge valve releases the vacuum that can be created at high altitudes, such as when on a flight. Handle folds down flush with top of case.
short_description: Store your important electronic, photo or other gear in this rugged watertight container offering 108 cubic inches of storage space.
